name: Combo Offers WooCommerce
author: QuanticEdge

sections.description:
Combo Offers WooCommerce will allow you to offer different combo deals to your users and boost your sales. You can add a bunch of products as a combo at discounted combo price.

Key features:

  • Set quantity for each product
  • AJAX search & choose products
  • Drag & drop to re-arrange
  • Auto calculate regular & sale price
  • Ability to add the variable product or specifically a variation to the combo
  • Mark the combo is virtual when all sub-products are virtual
  • WPML integration

Don’t believe it? Try it out here, its free..!!

Demo of Combo Offers Woocommerce

PRO version features:

  • Add unlimited sub products to your combo
  • Lifetime free updates
  • Excellent Support

Buy PRO version here: WooExtend

Thank you for LOVING our creations…!!

More plugins by WooExtend:

  • Woocommerce Bulk Order
  • Woo Product Category Discount
  • First Order Discount
  • Custom Fee

SUPPORT ME ON KO-FI BY A SMALL CONTRIBUTION: BUY ME A COFFEE!

Combo Offers Woocommerce can be used in these different languages thanks to the following translators:

  • Turkish – Önder Gökmen
  • Portuguese – Brazil – Alessandro Dias

Need support?

Visit plugin documentation website
sections.installation:
1. Please make sure that you installed WooCommerce
  2. Go to plugins in your dashboard and select “Add New”
  3. Search for “Combo Offers Woocommerce”, Install & Activate it
  4. Now when you create/edit a product you can choose product type is “Combo Product”, then add many products as you want
  5. Done! click Save and Go to front end
sections.faq:
Does this plugin allow me to add variable products to combo offer?

Yes! You can add variable products and also specific variations to combo.

Does this plugin takes care of shipping & inventory for combo?

Yes. It takes care everything for you!

Why can’t I add more than 3 products to combo?

You can purchase our Premium version to get this feature..
